alert.note: Alert for Independence (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 6:24PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Independence County through 700 PM CDT... At 624 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cushman, or near Batesville, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Batesville... Newark... Cushman... Oil Trough... Magness... Moorefield... Salado... Southside in Independence Count... Sulphur Rock... Bethesda... Thida... Rosie... Gainesboro... Desha... Pfeiffer... Locust Grove... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for eastern and north central Arkansas.
